After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Trainin.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of employees who complete training programs.
After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Trainin.FORMULA: (Number of Employees Completing Training / Total Number of Employees Enrolled) * 100

After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Trainin.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of employees who achieve certification after training.
After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Trainin.FORMULA: (Number of Employees Achieving Certification / Total Number of Employees Attempting Certification) * 100

After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Trainin.EXPLANATION: Measures the improvement in employee performance after training.
After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Trainin.FORMULA: (Performance Rating Post-Training - Performance Rating Pre-Training) / Performance Rating Pre-Training * 100

After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Trainin.EXPLANATION: Measures the cost of training per employee.
After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Trainin.FORMULA: Total Training Costs / Total Number of Employees Trained

After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Trainin.EXPLANATION: Measures the satisfaction rate of training programs.
After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Trainin.FORMULA: Average Rating of Training Program Satisfaction from Employee Feedback

After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Trainin.EXPLANATION: Measures the average time taken for employees to become competent after training.
After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Trainin.FORMULA: Average Time Taken for Employees to Reach Competency After Training
Average Rating of Trainer Effectiveness from Training Feedback

After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Trainin.KPIS: Return on investment (ROI) for training programs
After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Trainin.EXPLANATION: Measures the return on investment for training programs.
After Sales+Aftermarket Services+Trainin.FORMULA: (Financial Benefits from Training Programs - Training Costs) / Training Costs * 100
